title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Back: Detailed Report on Recent Attacks Against Hezbollah Targets in Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF has completed an attack on a series of targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization; an unmanned aircraft attacked a terrorist cell in Lebanese territory.

Before some time, an aircraft and a combat helicopter from the Air Force attacked several terrorist infrastructures and a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in Lebanese territory.

In addition, earlier today (Sunday), an unmanned aircraft attacked a terrorist cell that was identified in Lebanese territory. Also, an aircraft and a tank attacked combat and observation equipment of the Hezbollah terrorist organization.

Earlier today (Sunday), a launch from Lebanese territory towards the Hermon area was identified, an IDF tank attacked the source of the shooting. In addition, several launches towards the Rosh Hanikra area were identified.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3GJQFqS
